Grain.Do: Quinoa (1/2 cup cooked), Brown rice (1/2 cup cooked), Barley (1/2 cup cooked), Oats (1/2 cup cooked). These are cooling and easy to digest.
Grain.Dont: Excessive wheat, refined grains, fried grains. These can aggravate Pitta.

Legume.Do: Mung beans (1/3 cup cooked), Lentils (red or yellow, 1/3 cup cooked), Chickpeas (1/4 cup cooked). Opt for well-cooked and spiced legumes.
Legume.Dont: Black beans, kidney beans, large quantities of any bean. These can be harder to digest for Pitta.

Veg.Do: Cucumber (1 cup sliced), Zucchini (1 cup cooked), Broccoli (1 cup cooked), Sweet potatoes (1/2 cup cooked), Green beans (1 cup cooked). Focus on sweet, bitter, and astringent vegetables.
Veg.Dont: Peppers (all types), tomatoes, eggplant, onions, garlic, radishes. These are pungent and can increase Pitta.

Spices.Do: Coriander (1/2 tsp), Cumin (1/2 tsp), Fennel (1/2 tsp), Cardamom (1/4 tsp), Turmeric (1/4 tsp). These are cooling and digestive.
Spices.Dont: Chili peppers, black pepper, ginger (in excess), mustard seeds, asafoetida. These are heating.

Leafy veg.Do: Cilantro (1/2 cup chopped), Parsley (1/2 cup chopped), Romaine lettuce (1 cup). Lightly cooked or raw in moderation.
Leafy veg.Dont: Spinach (in excess), mustard greens, fenugreek leaves. These can be too heating or pungent.

Oil.Do: Ghee (1-2 tsp), Coconut oil (1-2 tsp), Sunflower oil (1-2 tsp). Use in moderation.
Oil.Dont: Sesame oil, mustard oil, corn oil. These are heating.

Fruits.Do: Melon (1 cup cubed), Berries (1 cup), Grapes (1 cup), Pears (1 medium), Apples (1 medium, cooked if preferred). Sweet and cooling fruits.
Fruits.Dont: Sour fruits like citrus (in excess), pineapple, papaya. These can be too acidic.

Nuts and Dry fruits.Do: Almonds (soaked, 5-7), Walnuts (2-3). Soak almonds to make them more digestible.
Nuts and Dry fruits.Dont: Peanuts, cashews, pistachios (in excess), dried dates, figs. These can be heating and heavy.

Milk product.Do: Cooling milk (1 cup, not too cold), Yogurt (1/2 cup, diluted or with cooling spices), Paneer (2 oz).
Milk product.Dont: Hard cheeses, sour yogurt, buttermilk (in excess). Avoid if lactose intolerant.

Condiments.Do: Sweet chutney (made from fruits), Mint chutney, Coriander chutney. Small portions.
Condiments.Dont: Spicy pickles, very sour condiments, hot sauces. These can increase Pitta.
